## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000                                    |
| Rationale                         |  This order size, combined with the current stock level, provides a buffer for potential demand fluctuations and ensures sufficient coverage for the forecast period. It also allows for multiple purchases of the 10,000 unit minimum to achieve the required stock level while achieving the discount. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The recommended order size is 10,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase. This adjustment provides a more robust safety net and ensures the ability to meet demand even if it exceeds the forecast. |

| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  7.0                                       |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size leverages the discount threshold while maintaining a strong buffer against demand variability. This approach optimizes cost efficiency without compromising stock availability.  |
